short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable all desktop notifications with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to Chrome that turns off desktop notifications for all web pages. When the button is clicked again, the original notification settings are restored.
